page.title: 10Services
page.content: There are two stations in the area and the trains run normally twice an hour in each direction.The stations are on the main line to Waterloo to the north and Guildford and Portsmouth to the south .They provide two of the stops which are on the rush-hour route for about{two to six {hundred}commuters each day.They are both near main roads and provide an excellent train service. There are seventeen banks in the area. The main banks are {Midland,Natwest,Barclays and Lloyds;} Each has a branch in the main areas of {Addlestone,New Haw}and{Weybridge.} They provide an excellent loaning and saving service in this area.There are many good shops mostly small but there are some Super Markets such as{V.G.}and{Safeway.}The food shops in
